Part 4A - +Dividend reinvestment plan (DRP)
4A.1 What is the default option if +security holders do not indicate whether they want to participate in the DRP?
4A.2 Last date and time for lodgement of election
notices to share registry under DRP
Monday March 9, 2026 17:00:00
4A.3 DRP discount rate
%
4A.4 Period of calculation of reinvestment price
Start Date
10/3/2026
End Date
1/4/2026
4A.5 DRP price calculation methodology
Shares issued or transferred under the DRP will be the lesser of: 
1. the average price of Shares acquired on-market on the ASX over the relevant pricing period as defined in the DRP
Booklet, and 
2. the most recent published NTA per share before the relevant Record Date.  
4A.6 DRP Price (including any discount):
AUD
4A.7 DRP +securities +issue date
2/4/2026
4A.8 Will DRP +securities be a new issue?
4A.9 Is there a minimum dollar amount or number of +securities required for DRP participation?
4A.10 Is there a maximum dollar amount or number of +securities required for DRP participation?
4A.11 Are there any other conditions applying to DRP participation?
4A.11a Conditions for DRP participation
All shareholders with registered addresses in Australia or New Zealand (or as otherwise approved by the Board) may
elect to participate in the DRP, subject to the terms and conditions set out in the DRP Booklet. 
4A.12 Link to a copy of the DRP plan rules
https://tribecaip.com/lic/the-company/
